title: Texas Natural Meats Recalls Frozen Raw Ground Beef Products
summary: WASHINGTON, June 20, 2018 Texas Natural Meats, a Lott, Texas establishment, is recalling approximately 489 pounds of frozen raw, ground beef products that may be contaminated with Shiga toxin-producing E. coli (STEC) O103, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced...
